DOC.brief_title: In Vitro Study Effect Gadolinium Contrast Fibrocytes
DOC.detailed_description: Gadolinium contrast administer patient MRI image . Recently , investigator observe potential gadolinium toxicity patient . To investigate , investigator propose collect clinical data lab data obtain part clinical care . The investigator also plan obtain 25 cc peripheral blood 2-4 week , 4-6 week 3 month identify unique monocyte signature , gene polymorphism , quantitate circulating fibrocytes ( fresh blood culture ) . Plan enroll 15 patient kidney , pancreas liver transplant expose gadolinium contrast agent , 15 non-transplant patient expose gadolinium contrast 30 age- sex-matched healthy control expose gadolinium contrast .
DOC.criteria: Renal , pancreas liver transplant OR without organ transplant OR control Age 1870 Both gender Exposure gadolinium contrast agent ( exposure control ) Have transplant , contrast dye MRI Have transplant contrast dye MRI Healthy person MRI gadolinium reason .
